Question
========

Twee gebeurtenissen A en B zijn onafhankelijk als geldt

Answerlist
----------
* P (A &#8746; B) = P (A) + P (B)
* P (A &#8746; B) = P (A) + P (B) - P (A &#8745; B)
* P (A &#8745; B) = P (A)   P (B)
* P (A | B) = P (B | A)

Solution
========

The correct answer is  P (A &#8745; B) = P (A)   P (B)
